title: Diamond team looking for scrim partners
body: Hey, my diamond ranked 5's team is looking for scrim partners as ranked 5's queues are extremely long and the matchmaking is often unreliable.  We typically play in the late afternoon and the evenings. You must be a high elo team with high elo solo queue (D5+) and a high elo ranked 5's team (P1+). If interested add me directly at 5YearOldGeneral.
